author: cmpilato
msg: Modify the svn_fs_closest_copy() test a little bit to reveal a bug in
the implementation (noticed while investigating issue #2600).
* subversion/tests/libsvn_fs/fs-test.c
(closest_copy_test): Add an extra modification to a path that was
added to a copied directory *after* the copy occured, revealing a
bug spotted in the implementations of svn_fs_closest_copy().

author: bhuvan
msg: * COMMITTERS
(bhuvan): Add myself as partial committer for the svn2feed.py.

author: cmpilato
msg: Add a new, currently XFAILing, test for issue #2600, a bug reported on
the mailing list (http://svn.haxx.se/dev/archive-2006-08/0098.shtml).
Hopefully I'll have a solution soon.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_repos/repos-test.c
(node_locations2): New.
(test_funcs): Reference the new test.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Permit davautocheck.sh to work with ra_serf as well.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/davautocheck.sh:
Use egrep to look for ra_dav or ra_serf in our built client.

author: malcolm
msg: Replace a clearly-incorrect pt_BR translation with one that's probably
correct.
Attempt a cut-and-paste translation using the message from the 1.4.x
branch and the other messages in this file.  Account for the message
change in r21242, and mark the translation as fuzzy to ensure review by
the pt-BR translator.
Found by: maxb
* subversion/po/pt_BR.po
Fix the translation of the svndumpfilter general help message.
